Room.Name: Prayer Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Prayer Room next to a black docket below Rutger's Throne.
Room.LongDescription: You are advised to consider carefully before you rescind your pledge to Prince Rutger. This room has been set aside so that you may seek devine guidance concerning the choice you are about to make, and so you may be sure it is the correct one. If you decide to renounce your loyalty, enter the small docket wreathed in black velvet. Prince Rutger will observe.
